investmentBaseTypes.label: Global Equity
investmentBaseTypes.helpText: Represents broadly diversified equity investments like global index funds or ETFs. For reference, the average growth rate of the S&P500 over the last 30 years has been around 10%.

investmentBaseTypes.label: Global Bonds
investmentBaseTypes.helpText: Represents diversified bond investments (government or corporate). Bonds typically offer lower returns than equities but with lower volatility.
